subject: My name is  Gui Anvanith  ,
body:
My name is  Gui Anvanith  , a Board Member of Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia
(FTB). A late investor of our bank died and left $32,640.000.00 Million dollars
in our bank some years ago and there was no next of kin to claim this
fund.
Please get back to me as soon as possible for more details if you are
interested in my proposal. Contact me here on my email address!!!!!! 
Best Regards
Mr Gui Anvanith
Account Manage

subject: Re:   My name is  Gui Anvanith  ,
body:
Hello Mr. Gui Anvanith,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposal. I must say, it's not every day that one receives an email like this.

I'm curious about the situation though. How did you come across my contact information? And why was there no next of kin to claim this fund? 

Looking forward to hearing more details from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ralph

subject: Re: My name is Gui Anvanith ,
body:
Dear  Ralph

Thanks for your mail, how are you and your health? Itâ€™s the will of God to
know you in this transaction. I am a senior staff in Foreign Trade bank
here in Cambodia; I have been a banker for 27 years now. I have had a
client for years and I control his account here in Foreign Trade bank,
unfortunately his family was involved in the tsunami disaster on the 26
December 2004 in Sumatra Indonesia where they all lost their lives.

Based on this incident he started sick for years and developed heart
problems and passed away on 12th march 2005 leaving nobody as the next of
kin. On his sick bed I am the only person that controls his hospital bills
because I am in control of his money being his personal accountant.

After years of the fund $32,640,000 (Thirty Two Million Six Hundred and
Forty Thousand United States Dollars) here in Foreign Trade bank none of
the family was alive for the claims, recently Foreign Trade bank board
directors stipulate to send this money to the government treasury purse. I
am a living witness of this fund which I will not like the government to
have together with his estate. I decided to contact you to stand as the
relative next of kin because you share the same name with him.

After my research I got your contact information from a reputable
business/professional directory of your country which gives me assurance of
your legibility as a person while trying to get a good and capable business
for both business and investment purposes.

All documents relating to my late client and the fund are in my possession.
Hence, you do not need to worry yourself or entertain any fear in you at
all in this transaction. With your consent, I will file your name
officially as the inheritor and will monitor the process, giving you every
information/advice on how to claim this fund and successfully transfer it
to your nominated bank account. You will get 50% of the amount at the
conclusion of this transaction for your partnership.

Meanwhile I will need you to confirm your information below so that it will
enable me officially file your name at the bank as the inheritor for the
bank to start the release process:

1. Full names
2. Full address
3. Occupation
4. Direct telephone number for easy communication.

All I require from you is your maximum cooperation.

Here is my Direct num +855-87496177
My whats-pp Phone Num +855.98502242
Here Attached is my ID card.

Mr Anvanith Gui
Board member
Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia
Phnom Penh

subject: Re: My name is Gui Anvanith ,
body:
Hello Mr. Anvanith Gui,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your email was quite a surprise! It's not every day that one receives news of such an unexpected inheritance.

It's truly tragic to hear about the fate of your late client and his family. The tsunami disaster in Sumatra Indonesia was indeed a devastating event, and it's heartbreaking to know that so many lives were lost.

You mentioned that my name is the same as your late client's. That's quite a coincidence! I'm curious, what was his name? And how did he come to be in Cambodia?

Also, you mentioned that you found my contact information from a reputable business directory. May I ask which directory this was? I don't recall listing my details on any business directories recently.

Regarding the inheritance process, could you please provide more details? How does it work exactly? And what would be expected of me throughout this process?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ralph
